DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy 31 mm GORE EXCLUDER速 AAA Endoprosthesis treatment infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm
DOC.brief_title: Study Large Diameter GORE EXCLUDER速 AAA Endoprosthesis Abdominal Aneurysms
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study estimate safety 31 mm GORE EXCLUDER速 AAA Endoprosthesis compare open surgical repair use treatment infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm . A secondary objective compare device performance original GORE EXCLUDER速 AAA Endoprosthesis 31mm EXCLUDER use treatment infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm .
DOC.criteria: Infrarenal AAA > equal 4.5 cm diameter Proximal infrarenal aortic neck length > equal 15mm Anatomy meet 31mm EXCLUDER specification criterion Access vessel able receive 20 Fr . introducer sheath Life expectancy > 2 year Surgical candidate ASA Class I , II , III , IV NYHA Class I , II , III 21 year age old Male infertile female Ability comply protocol requirement include followup Signed Informed Consent Form Mycotic rupture aneurysm Participating another investigational device drug study within 1 year Documented history drug abuse within 6 month Coexisting thoracic aortic aneurysm ( 50 % large proximal aorta ) Myocardial infarction cerebral vascular accident within 6 week Pulmonary insufficiency require chronic home oxygen therapy inability ambulate due pulmonary function Renal insufficiency ( Creatinine > 2.5 mg/dL ) without dialysis Iliac anatomy would require occlusion internal iliac artery `` Planned '' occlusion reimplantation significant mesenteric renal artery `` Planned '' concomitant surgical procedure previous major surgery within 30 day Previous prosthesis placement position aorta iliac artery Degenerative connective tissue disease , e.g. , Marfans Ehlers Danlos Syndrome Proximal neck angulation > 60 degree Presence significant thrombus arterial implantation site
